details.objective: Understand how to use linear regression for predictive analysis
details.input: Dataset with numerical values for training

details.objective: Learn how to build decision tree models for classification and regression tasks
details.input: Dataset with features and target variable

details.objective: Master the concepts and implementation of Support Vector Machine algorithm
details.input: Dataset with features and target variable

details.objective: Learn how to group data points into clusters using the K-Means algorithm
details.output: Cluster labels for each data point

details.objective: Understand the fundamentals of neural networks and their application in deep learning
To understand the concept of supervised learning and its applications.
To learn how to classify data into predefined categories.
details.input: Dataset with features and corresponding labels

details.objective: To understand how to predict continuous values based on input data.
details.input: Dataset with continuous target variable and input features

details.objective: To classify images into different categories.
To categorize text documents into predefined classes.
Understand and implement unsupervised learning algorithms to discover patterns in data without labeled outcomes.
details.output: Clustered data points or latent representations

details.objective: Learn how to partition an image into multiple segments to simplify its representation or modify it for easier analysis.
Create new features from existing data to improve model performance and accuracy.
